tool_description:
an API that delivers live football data in the Arabic language
data is from all cups
title: sports data live

api_list.name: get matches by date
api_list.description:
enter a query data such 1-15-2022 as date parm

for ex :** baseurl/results/1-14-2022**
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sports-data-live.p.rapidapi.com/results/{results}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sports-data-live.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
